name: databox-app-light-graph
description: A simple Databox app that plots mobile phone light sensor data

scripts.release: docker build -t databox-app-light-graph . && docker tag databox-app-light-graph amar.io:5000/databox-app-light-graph && docker push amar.io:5000/databox-app-light-graph

author: Yousef Amar <yousef@amar.io> (http://yousefamar.com/)
